## Creating a new repository

You have two options when creating a new repository. You can click on the + next to your profile image in the top right corner of the screen or go to the repositories tab within your profile page and click the New button.

![Two ways to create a new repository](images/Create_repo.png){fig-align="center"}

Challenge: Creating a new repository.

1.  Name your repository - keep it short and precise

2.  Let's create a repository "My_first_repo"

3.  Describe it (optional)

4.  Select *Public/Private*. If you have a free account, all your repositories will be public.

5.  Check the box to initialize your repository with a "Readme.md"

6.  Click *Create repository*

    ![](images/Create_repo2.png)

Congratulations! You have created your first repository!
